snippet: The president of the Manhattan Chamber of Commerce replies to a recent editorial about a living wage proposal in New York City.
abstract: Letter from Manhattan Chamber of Commerce President Nancy Ploeger responds to Dec. 26 editorial on proposed living-wage bill in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The president of the Manhattan Chamber of Commerce replies to a recent editorial about a living wage proposal in New York City.

headline.main: A Wage Bill’s Effect on Jobs
headline.print_headline: A Wage Bill’s Effect on Jobs
